original_title: Ministry: In Case You Didn't Feel Like Showing Up
overview: filmed during the famous "The Mind is a Terrible Thing to Taste" tour with guest artists like Ogre (of Skinny Puppy) and Jello Biafra (of the Dead Kennedys).  1 Breathe  2 The Missing  3 Deity  4 So What  5 Burning Inside  6 Thieves  7 Stigmata  8 Jello Biafra  9 The Land Of Rape And Honey  Filmed September 3, 1990 at the Riviera Theater - 4746 N. Racine Avenue, Uptown, Chicago, Illinois, USA
title: Ministry: In Case You Didn't Feel Like Showing Up
